verses.verse: And when Rachel <S%H7354><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> she bore Jacob no children, <S%H3205><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3290><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> her sister; <S%H269><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Give <S%H3051><s%> me children, <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H518><s%> else <S%H369><s%> I <S%H595><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

And Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Rachel: <S%H7354><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Am I <S%H595><s%> in God's <S%H430><s%> stead, <S%H8478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> hath withheld <S%H4513><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the womb? <S%H990><s%>

And she said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> my maid <S%H519><s%> Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her; and she shall bear <S%H3205><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my knees, <S%H1290><s%> that I <S%H595><s%> may also <S%H1571><s%> have children <S%H1129><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> her.
And she gave <S%H5414><s%> him <S%H853><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> her handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to wife: <S%H802><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her.
And Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath judged <S%H1777><s%> me, and hath also <S%H1571><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and hath given <S%H5414><s%> me a son: <S%H1121><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> she his name <S%H8034><s%> Dan. <S%H1835><s%>
And Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> Rachel's <S%H7354><s%> maid <S%H8198><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> With great <S%H430><s%> wrestlings <S%H5319><s%> have I wrestled <S%H6617><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> my sister, <S%H269><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> I have prevailed: <S%H3201><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

When Leah <S%H3812><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> she had left <S%H5975><s%> bearing, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3205><s%> she took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> her maid, <S%H8198><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> her Jacob <S%H3290><s%> to wife. <S%H802><s%>
And Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> Leah's <S%H3812><s%> maid <S%H8198><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>
And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> A troop cometh: <S%H1413><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Gad. <S%H1410><s%>
And Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> Leah's <S%H3812><s%> maid <S%H8198><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Happy <S%H837><s%> am I, for <S%H3588><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> will call me blessed: <S%H833><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Asher. <S%H836><s%>

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them unto <S%H413><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%> Leah. <S%H3812><s%> Then Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Leah, <S%H3812><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> of thy son's <S%H1121><s%> mandrakes. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1736><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Is it a small matter <S%H4592><s%> that thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> my husband? <S%H376><s%> and wouldest thou take away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> my son's <S%H1121><s%> mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> also? <S%H1571><s%> And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Therefore <S%H3651><s%> he shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee tonight <S%H3915><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> thy son's <S%H1121><s%> mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Thou must come in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me; for <S%H3588><s%> surely I have hired <S%H7936><s%> <S%H7936><s%> thee with my son's <S%H1121><s%> mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%> And he lay <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> her that <S%H1931><s%> night. <S%H3915><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> me my hire, <S%H7939><s%> because <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> my maiden <S%H8198><s%> to my husband: <S%H376><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Issachar. <S%H3485><s%>
And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath endued <S%H2064><s%> me with a good <S%H2896><s%> dowry; <S%H2065><s%> now <S%H6471><s%> will my husband <S%H376><s%> dwell with <S%H2082><s%> me, because <S%H3588><s%> I have born <S%H3205><s%> him six <S%H8337><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>
And afterwards <S%H310><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> a daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Dinah. <S%H1783><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her, and opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> her womb. <S%H7358><s%>
And she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath taken away <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> my reproach: <S%H2781><s%>

And she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall add <S%H3254><s%> to me another <S%H312><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> had born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Laban, <S%H3837><s%> Send me away, <S%H7971><s%> that I may go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> mine own place, <S%H4725><s%> and to my country. <S%H776><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H853><s%> my wives <S%H802><s%> and my children, <S%H3206><s%> for whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H2004><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> thee, and let me go: <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> my service <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H5647><s%> thee.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> tarry: for I have learned by experience <S%H5172><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> me for thy sake. <S%H1558><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> Appoint <S%H5344><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me thy wages, <S%H7939><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thou <S%H859><s%> knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> how <S%H834><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> thee, and how <S%H834><s%> thy cattle <S%H4735><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> it was little <S%H4592><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hadst <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> I came, and it is now increased <S%H6555><s%> unto a multitude; <S%H7230><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee since my coming: <S%H7272><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> when <S%H4970><s%> shall I <S%H595><s%> provide <S%H6213><s%> for mine own house <S%H1004><s%> also? <S%H1571><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall I give <S%H5414><s%> thee? And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me any thing: <S%H3972><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> for me, I will again <S%H7725><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> thy flock: <S%H6629><s%>

I will pass through <S%H5674><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy flock <S%H6629><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> removing <S%H5493><s%> from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> cattle, <S%H7716><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the brown <S%H2345><s%> cattle <S%H7716><s%> among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> and the spotted <S%H2921><s%> and speckled <S%H5348><s%> among the goats: <S%H5795><s%> and of such shall be <S%H1961><s%> my hire. <S%H7939><s%>

So shall my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> for me in time <S%H3117><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it shall come <S%H935><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> my hire <S%H7939><s%> before thy face: <S%H6440><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is not <S%H369><s%> speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> among the goats, <S%H5795><s%> and brown <S%H2345><s%> among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> shall be counted stolen <S%H1589><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I would <S%H3863><s%> it might be <S%H1961><s%> according to thy word. <S%H1697><s%>

And he removed <S%H5493><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H853><s%> the he goats <S%H8495><s%> that were ringstreaked <S%H6124><s%> and spotted, <S%H2921><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the she goats <S%H5795><s%> that were speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted, <S%H2921><s%> and every one <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> had some white <S%H3836><s%> in it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the brown <S%H2345><s%> among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

And he set <S%H7760><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> between <S%H996><s%> himself and Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of Laban's <S%H3837><s%> flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him rods <S%H4731><s%> of green <S%H3892><s%> poplar, <S%H3839><s%> and of the hazel <S%H3869><s%> and chestnut tree; <S%H6196><s%> and peeled <S%H6478><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> streaks <S%H6479><s%> in them, <S%H2004><s%> and made the white <S%H3836><s%> appear <S%H4286><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in <S%H5921><s%> the rods. <S%H4731><s%>

And he set <S%H3322><s%> <S%H853><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had peeled <S%H6478><s%> before <S%H5227><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters <S%H7298><s%> in the watering <S%H4325><s%> troughs <S%H8268><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to drink, <S%H8354><s%> that they should conceive <S%H3179><s%> when they came <S%H935><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And the flocks <S%H6629><s%> conceived <S%H3179><s%> before <S%H413><s%> the rods, <S%H4731><s%> and brought forth <S%H3205><s%> cattle <S%H6629><s%> ringstreaked, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and spotted. <S%H2921><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> did separate <S%H6504><s%> the lambs, <S%H3775><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the flocks <S%H6629><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the ringstreaked, <S%H6124><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the brown <S%H2345><s%> in the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban; <S%H3837><s%> and he put <S%H7896><s%> his own flocks <S%H5739><s%> by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and put <S%H7896><s%> them not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> Laban's <S%H3837><s%> cattle. <S%H6629><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> whensoever <S%H3605><s%> the stronger <S%H7194><s%> cattle <S%H6629><s%> did conceive, <S%H3179><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> before the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the cattle <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters, <S%H7298><s%> that they might conceive <S%H3179><s%> among the rods. <S%H4731><s%>

But when the cattle <S%H6629><s%> were feeble, <S%H5848><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> them not <S%H3808><s%> in: so the feebler <S%H5848><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> Laban's, <S%H3837><s%> and the stronger <S%H7194><s%> Jacob's. <S%H3290><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> increased <S%H6555><s%> exceedingly, <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and had <S%H1961><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> cattle, <S%H6629><s%> and maidservants, <S%H8198><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and camels, <S%H1581><s%> and asses. <S%H2543><s%>
